# Wander Peaks

> Premium Himalayan Trekking and Chardham Yatra Tour Operator based in Haridwar, Uttarakhand, India.

## About

Wander Peaks is a travel agency specializing in sacred Himalayan pilgrimages and adventure tours. With 10+ years of experience and 15,000+ happy travelers, we offer expertly curated packages for Chardham Yatra, Kedarnath, Badrinath, and other spiritual destinations in Uttarakhand.

## Contact

- **Phone**: +91 74510 43112
- **Email**: chardhamyatra004@gmail.com
- **Address**: Niranjani Akhara Road, Haridwar, Uttarakhand 249401, India
- **Website**: https://wanderpeaks.com

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://wanderpeaks.com/): Main landing page with featured packages and destinations
- [Packages](https://wanderpeaks.com/packages.html): All tour packages with pricing
- [Destinations](https://wanderpeaks.com/destinations.html): Explore Uttarakhand destinations
- [Services](https://wanderpeaks.com/services.html): Our travel services
- [About Us](https://wanderpeaks.com/about.html): Company history and mission
- [Contact](https://wanderpeaks.com/contact.html): Get in touch with us

## Yatra (Pilgrimage) Pages

### Ek Dham & Do Dham
- [Kedarnath Yatra](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/kedarnath.html): Sacred journey to Lord Shiva's abode at 3,583m
- [Badrinath Yatra](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/badrinath.html): Visit the holy shrine of Lord Vishnu
- [Do Dham Yatra](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/do-dham.html): Combined Kedarnath and Badrinath pilgrimage

### Char Dham
- [Char Dham Yatra](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/char-dham.html): Complete four-temple circuit (Yamunotri, Gangotri, Kedarnath, Badrinath)
- [Char Dham by Helicopter](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/char-dham-helicopter.html): Premium helicopter pilgrimage

### Panch Kedar & Panch Badri
- [Panch Kedar](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/panch-kedar.html): Five sacred Shiva temples in Garhwal
- [Panch Badri](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/panch-badri.html): Five Vishnu temples in Uttarakhand
- [Panch Prayag](https://wanderpeaks.com/yatras/panch-prayag.html): Five sacred river confluences

## Key Topics

- Chardham Yatra packages and itineraries
- Kedarnath temple trek and darshan
- Badrinath temple visit
- Helicopter services to Char Dham
- Uttarakhand pilgrimage planning
- Himalayan spiritual tourism
- Do Dham, Panch Kedar, Panch Badri circuits
